successes.title: Vanhawks Valour | First ever connected carbon fibre bicycle
successes.description: The first connected bike featuring performance tracking, security sensors & interactive feedback to radically change the way you ride.

Pledges.description: A big thank you email to express our gratitude. Your name will be proudly displayed on the backer's wall hosted on our website.
Vanhawks special 11"x14" poster designed by local talent, Jonathan Reed. Screen printed in Toronto on high-quality paper. (US/Canada shipping included. Please add $25 for International shipping.)
Vanhawks limited edition t-shirt. Screen printed in Toronto on a high-quality tee. (US/Canada shipping included. Please add $25 for International shipping.)
Vanhawks limited edition commuter jacket. (US/Canada shipping included. Please add $25 for International shipping.)

SINGLE-SPEED/FIXIE EARLY BACKER SPECIAL-LIMITED EDITION: Your very own 2014 Vanhawks Valour. The world's first connected bike built with proprietary carbon fibre technology. This limited edition bike is engraved with the production number. Matte black finish. Available in S, M, and L. (Only available in the US and Canada at this time.)
SINGLE-SPEED/FIXIE BACKER SPECIAL: Your very own 2014 Vanhawks Valour. The world's first connected bike built with proprietary carbon fibre technology. Matte black finish. Available in S, M, and L.

SINGLE-SPEED/FIXIE INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Your very own 2014 Vanhawks Valour. The world's first connected bike built with proprietary carbon fibre technology. Matte black finish. (Available in Western Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, China, Hong Kong)

SINGLE-SPEED/FIXIE INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Your very own 2014 Vanhawks Valour. The world's first connected bike built with proprietary carbon fibre technology. Matte black finish. (Available in Western Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, China, Hong Kong, Singapore)

This limited edition bike is engraved with the production number. Matte black finish. Available in S, M, and L. (Only available in the US and Canada at this time.)
